name: Carrot Bunny
description:
My first 2d game! A lot of things are missing, like music, and many features. It is still in development, and updates will come every few days. Every support will be appreciated!

Controls:

Left Arrow - Go Left

Right Arrow - Go Right

Rules:

1) The point of the game is to help Bunny collect all the carrots and to not let them touch the ground! 

2) If carrot touches the ground, you lose 1 life.

3) If you lose 3 lives, you are out!

4)  If you catch golden carrot, Bunny gains power up for 10 seconds.

Enjoy!
